metadata.title: CVE-2020-1765 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper control of parameters allows the spoofing of the from fields ofthe following screens: AgentTicketCompose, AgentTicketForward,AgentTicketBounce and AgentTicketEmailOutbound. This issue affects:((OTRS)) Community Edition 5.0.x version 5.0.39 and prior versions; 6.0.xversion 6.0.24 and prior versions. OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.13 and priorversions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
